Description: 
This application implements three commands to demonstrate the Creation, modification and deletion of entities.

To run the sample:
Please use Visual Studio 2017 to open the solution called "DotNetSamples.sln"ï¼Œthen build the application.

To use DrawLine.dll:
1. Start ZWCAD and open a new drawing.
2. Run NETLOAD command and load the DrawLine.dll file in the output directory.
3. Execute the "DrawLine" command, which draws a line.
4. Execute the "ModLine" command, which modifies the line. 
5. Execute the "EraseLine" command, which erases the line.
